item.description:
Chinese Five-Element
Healing Intensive
with KESHAV HOWE



Traditional Chinese healing attributes health to the natural flow of energy, or chi. The five elements (earth, fire, water, wood and metal) govern our lives and the lives of everything we know.

Each element corresponds to a season of the year, a color, an odor, a sound, an organ system in the body, an emotion, and much more. It is through the interweaving of these elements that we achieve a healthy spiritual, emotional and physical balance. Working with the five elements, Keshav will demonstrate how you can facilitate an opening into an ancient healing bond.


FRIDAY, FEBRUARY 18 - FULL MOON
GLASTONBURY - Sacred Rivers Yoga
Time: 7 to 9 p.m.
Cost: $20 cash
item.name: Five-Element Healing
